K01bsu058_u:2854: yattu upādhyāyasya anupasaṃpannatve saṃvarasya utthānamuktaṃ saṃghamadhikṛtya etad,
K01bsu058_u:2858: saṃvaramukhatvāt upādhyāyasya tad-pratyācakṣaṇe nāsti saṃvarasya utthānam //
K01bsu058_u:2859: grantho 'tra - upasaṃpadyamānaḥ upādyāyaṃ pratyākhyātaṃ upasaṃpanno vaktavyo 'nupasaṃpanno vaktavyaḥ?
K01bsu058_u:2862: anayoḥ kṣetropādhyāyoḥ samādātrā [karma]kārakeṇa vā nāmānutkīrtane na bhavati saṃvarasya utthānam //
K01bsu058_u:2874: karmakārakaṃ prati ayaṃ granthaḥ - “trayāṇāṃ nāma na parikīrtayati - upādhyāyasya,
K01bsu058_u:2884: yad karmakārakeṇa samādātuḥ tadviṣayatvasya upanīteḥ tadakaraṇam /
K01bsu058_u:2888: yasmāt yatra karmaṇi tatra saṃghasya kartṛtvapratipattiḥ,
K01bsu058_u:2899: ābhyāṃ dhvajābhyāṃ gṛhītābhyāṃ na bhavati saṃvarasyotthānam /
K01bsu058_u:2903: samādānato nagnībhūtasya tīrthikadhvajaḥ iti anenaiva saṃgrahāt /
K01bsu058_u:2914: tasmāt yena nimittena āpattyadarśanādinā - utkṣepaṇīyaṃ karmakṛtaṃ bhavati,
K01bsu058_u:2933: samādātra antarāyikasya 'asti me 'ntarāyikam' iti pratijñāne saṃvarasya dāne duṣkṛtamāṭrakaṃ,
K01bsu058_u:2935: nidāneṣvatra granthaḥ - “antarāyikaiḥ tāvat bhadanta dharmaiḥ samanvāgatam,
K01bsu058_u:2944: etatpradarśanaṃ - vyañjanāntarasya prakāratvāt atrotthānaṃ na syāt /
K01bsu058_u:2948: asya puruṣasya anukṛtitvasya hastacchinnāḥ pādacchinnā ityādinā ākṣiptatvam,
K01bsu058_u:2953: bhikṣavastu upasaṃpādakāḥ āpadyante duṣkṛtāmiti” pāpalakṣaṇe granthaḥ //
K01bsu058_u:2958: saṃsthāna-pramāṇa-daśābhedo manuṣyāṇāṃ yatra dvīpe tanmātravyudāśasavaraṃ atra dvīpagrahaṇaṃ vyavatiṣṭhate /
K01bsu058_u:2960: evaṃ ca ekadvīpakānāmapi eṣa mukha-karṇaprāvaraṇādīnāṃ pratikṣiptatvaṃ veditavyam //
K01bsu058_u:2976: antaḥ kubjo bahīḥ kubjaḥ antarbahiḥ kubja iti,
K01bsu058_u:2998: apāṅgasamīpavarti yo akṣyavayavaḥ sa yasya nāsāsamīpe,
K01bsu058_u:3004: galitapakṣmaromatvāt vigaladraktamāsavat akṣṇaḥ paryanto yasya asau kaśmīlitākṣaḥ /
K01bsu058_u:3005: akṣākṣaḥ iti akṣayoḥ akṣiṇī yasya asau akṣākṣaḥ /
K01bsu058_u:3006: akṣiśāla-śantra dardru-vicarcikā iti akṣiśabdasya pratyekaṃ nipātaḥ /
K01bsu058_u:3017: aṇḍalāṅgulapraticchanna iti aṇḍābhyāṃ lāṅgūlaḥ praticchannaḥ asya iti aṇḍalāṅgūlapraticchanna iti aṇḍābhyāṃ lāṅgūlaḥ praticchannaḥ asya iti aṇḍalāṅgūlapraticchanaḥ //
K01bsu058_u:3019: mūḍha ityanena upasaṃpadaṃ na jānātītyasya saṃgṛhītatvam //
K01bsu058_u:3021: mūkavadhira iti mūkagraḥaṇena satyāṃ jihvāyāṃ vaktumasamarthaḥ jihvāhīnaḥ,
K01bsu058_u:3023: [ekahastapādaḥ iti ekaśabdasya] hastapādaśabdayoḥ pratyekaṃ saṃbandhaḥ - ekahastaḥ,
K01bsu058_u:3028: hasti-aśva-śva-go-meṣa-mṛga-matsya-ahi-dīrgha-bahuśīrṣa iti śīrṣaśabdasya pratyekaṃ abhisaṃbaṃdhaḥ - hastiśīrṣaḥ aśvaśīrṣaḥ,
K01bsu058_u:3037: 'sarvanīlaḥ sarvapītaḥ sarvalohitaḥ sarvāvadāta' iti etadapi yatpaṭhyate,
K01bsu058_u:3046: sarveṇa sarvaṃ yadbhūyasā yasya vā abhiprāṇātipātapravarttā /
K01bsu058_u:3054: asatyapi janakatve mātāpitṛparigraheṇa avasthitayoḥ anujñāne saptāhadhāraṇe saṃghe ca ārocane [mātā-]pitṛtvaṃ,
K01bsu058_u:3061: evaṃ dhītikṛtikā yasya dhītitvaṃ upagatikā” - ityatra granthaḥ //
K01bsu058_u:3077: yad māṭṛghātakādeḥ pravrājanaṃ pratiṣiddhaṃ tatra ānantaryakṛtvaṃ tattu pratipattavyam /
K01bsu058_u:3078: ānantaryakārī na pravrājyaḥ ityevaṃ puna stad /
K01bsu058_u:3079: na sarvamātṛghāṭako na pravrājya ityevaṃ ca /
K01bsu058_u:3082: kasmin bhikṣuṇyāṃ kṛte bhikṣuṇīdūṣakatvaṃ jātaṃ bhavati,
K01bsu058_u:3096: no tu sahite pratiyogisvādanena dūṣakatvasya utthānam,
K01bsu058_u:3097: ityasya na hi anya-pradoṣeṇa anyasya saṃbaṃdhaḥ,
K01bsu058_u:3113: nipātane vā āmarṣaṇe vā aparājitatvaṃ bhikṣuṇyā iti hi etad adūṣakatva-vijñānam /
K01bsu058_u:3122: (644) arhatvaṃ pravrajyopasaṃpadoḥ upagatau puṃstvasya hīnāyāṃ yoṣiti //
K01bsu058_u:3123: śikṣāṃ pratyākhyāya hīnāyāṃ vṛttāyāṃ striyāṃ vyaṃjanaparivṛttyā puṃstvogatau arhatvaṃ pravrajyopasaṃpadoḥ /
K01bsu058_u:3126: 'arhatvaṃ pravrajyopasaṃpadoḥ upagatau puṃstvasya hīnāyāṃ yoṣiti' - ityanubandhaḥ //
K01bsu058_u:3128: poṣadhavastu atra granthaḥ - “yaduktaṃ bhagavatā bhikṣuṇī bhiḥ bhikṣūṇāmantike bhikṣuṇībhāvaḥ paryeṣitavyaḥ iti katamesāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ āvāsika-naivāsikānāṃ, upālin“, iti /
K01bsu058_u:3129: tatsthānagatā vāsasthaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ upaniśritya bhikṣuṇīnāṃ vāsaḥ /
K01bsu058_u:3131: na ca niśrayātikramo yuktaḥ ityetad vijñānam /
K01bsu058_u:3136: gṛhyamāṇe saṃvare tasya saṃvarasya yadbhavatvaṃ tasya tadavasthasya utsṛṣṭau pratyākhyānādinā utsarge dhvaṃso bhavati /
K01bsu058_u:3138: na ca āneghasya pratyudāvṛttiḥ laṅghanādau dṛśyate /
K01bsu058_u:3139: tasmāt, na bhavatyasyā 'jāyamānatve saṃvarasya pratyudāvṛttiḥ iti yo manyeta tannābhinivṛttyartha etatsūtram /
